mapper.insert: insert ignore into course(course_code, course_name, course_credit, course_hour, course_type, course_type_name, unit_name) VALUES (#{course.courseCode}, #{course.courseName}, #{course.courseCredit}, #{course.courseHour}, #{course.courseType}, #{course.courseTypeName}, #{course.unitName})
mapper.select: select course_code, course_name, course_credit, course_hour, course_type, course_type_name, unit_name from course where course_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
select course_code, course_name, course_credit, course_hour, course_type, course_type_name, unit_name from course where course_code like concat(#{collegeCode}, '%')
